about_the_game:
Get the most out of your VIVE Pro 2 with VIVE Console.

Video settings feature motion compensation which reduces computing time while still keeping the frame rate at 90Hz. This helps provide a smooth experience when using less than ideal hardware specs. Turn on mirror VR to show what you see inside the headset on your computer screen.

Select automatic in the display settings to let VIVE Console choose the best setting based on your hardware or manually set the resolution and frame rate you want.

Join the Beta program to be eligible to receive preview builds and provide feedback.

VIVE Console has troubleshooting options to remove and reinstall drivers used by your VR hardware. It also lets you report an issue or send feedback directly from the app.

Install VIVE Console and get the best performance for your VIVE Pro 2.

legal_notice:
Disclaimers:
VIVE Pro 2 Headset only supports 2448 x 1224 pixels combined and 90Hz via VIVE Wireless Adapter.
GeForce® RTX 20 Series (Turing) or AMD Radeon™ 5000 (Navi) generations or newer required for Full Resolution mode (4896 x 2448 pixels combined).
DisplayPort 1.4 or higher with DSC is required for Full Resolution mode.

name: VIVE Console for SteamVR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen™ 1500 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen™ 1500 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon™ RX 5700 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: VIVE Console is an application designed to optimize the video and display settings on your VIVE Pro 2 headset. VIVE Console includes software and drivers that help deliver the best performance for your VIVE Pro 2 system in SteamVR™.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Russian, Swedish
